solution_line_template: The sausages take {sausage_time_per} minutes per sausage * {num_sausages} sausages = <<{sausage_time_per}*{num_sausages}={sausage_total_time}>>{sausage_total_time} minutes to cook.
The eggs take {egg_time_per} minutes per egg * {num_eggs} eggs = <<{egg_time_per}*{num_eggs}={egg_total_time}>>{egg_total_time} minutes to cook.
So in total, it takes {sausage_total_time} minutes for sausages + {egg_total_time} minutes for eggs = <<{sausage_total_time}+{egg_total_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes to cook breakfast.
